metadata.description:
Information sheet on guerrilla activity in Leyte dated October 30, 1944

Military letter from the Office of the Senior Inspector of the Philippine Constabulary in Leyte to the district adjutant in Cebu; intercepted by the First Censorship Area Detachment discussing the strength of the Philippine Constabulary and guerrlla activity on Leyte
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
metadata.title: Information sheet on Guerilla Activity in Leyte dated October 30, 1944
